Utilities forFs (File System)

Consts

InvalidChars = {'/', '\\', ':', '*', '?', '\"', '<', '>'}
Source   Edit  

Procs

func escapeFs(str: string; toReplace = '-'): string {....raises: [], tags: [],
    forbids: [].}
Escapes the invalid chars in FS

Example:

doAssert escapeFs("10/2: ?") == "10-2- -"
